How does the study suggest the methodolo: For designing nanobody binders for the SARS-CoV-2 spike protein.
For developing vaccines against bacterial infections.
For engineering enzymes with enhanced catalytic activity.
For creating synthetic polymers with novel properties.
What role do short linear motifs (SLiMs): They mediate flexible yet specific interactions contributing to NPC heterogeneity.
They inhibit the binding of Nup60 to other nucleoporins.
They stabilize the nuclear basket structure independently of the NPC core.
They prevent the dimerization of Nup60 with other proteins.
What was the primary purpose of using Al: To predict protein-protein interactions and structural conformations.
To simulate the dynamics of the nuclear basket in real-time.
To sequence the entire genome of Saccharomyces cerevisiae.
To design new nucleoporins with enhanced stability.
Which experimental techniques were used: Isothermal titration calorimetry and size exclusion chromatography
X-ray crystallography and nuclear magnetic resonance
Cryo-electron microscopy and small-angle X-ray scattering
Fluorescence resonance energy transfer and circular dichroism
